changeSet.author: Maksim Balashov
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE person ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY, first_name VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, last_name VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL, birthday DATE, transplantation_date DATE, is_activated BOOL DEFAULT FALSE, is_deleted BOOL DEFAULT FALSE )

changeSet.author: Maksim Balashov
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE person_organ ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY, person_id UUID NOT NULL, organ VARCHAR(100), FOREIGN KEY (person_id) REFERENCES person(id) )

changeSet.author: Maksim Balashov
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE santa_registration ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY, address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, wishes VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, person_id UUID NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (person_id) REFERENCES person(id) )

changeSet.author: Maksim Balashov
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE file_info ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, url VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, size BIGINT NOT NULL )

changeSet.author: Maksim Balashov
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE santa_pair ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY, santa_id UUID NOT NULL, recipient_id UUID NOT NULL, file_id UUID, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'CHOOSING', comment TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (santa_id) REFERENCES santa_registration(id), FOREIGN KEY (recipient_id) REFERENCES santa_registration(id), FOREIGN KEY (file_id) REFERENCES file_info(id) )
